page.title: 03Views of Thurgoland
page.content: One day last week Mr Furniss,Mrs Bailey and Mrs Bedford came to be interviewed. We asked them what they thought of Thurgoland.They all said that we needed a butcher's shop and Mr Furniss suggested that we want a cafe so we can get more people to travel into Thurgoland.Mrs Bailey said we should have a fish and chip shop.someone asked "Do you like Thurgoland better now or in the past?"They all said that they liked it better now because they have electricity and a better bus service to Barnsley and Sheffield.But Mrs Bailey said that she didn't want all the new houses because she didn't know all the new people.All of them said that they didn't want Thurgoland any bigger than it is now.
